p: The antibacterial activities of pure compound 309 was evaluated against Gram-positive bacteria Staphylococcus aureus and Bacillus subtilis and Gram-negative bacteria Pseudomonas aeruginosa and E scherichia coli using the disk diffusion assay. The new compound 309 showed inhibitory activity against S. aureus at 0.04 µg/paper disk, and the diameter of inhibition zone was 0.71 cm. The MIC for compound 309 against S. aureus was 100 µg/mL using the broth microdilution method, while streptomycin was employed as the positive control with an MIC of around 50 µg/mL [ 102].
